EVID.rationale: EPA UCMR5 survey data, peer-reviewed NIEHS studies, and state PWS compliance records all cited.

MECH.rationale: Bioaccumulation, renal clearance, and point-source contamination mechanisms documented with primary literature.

INC.rationale: Regulatory delay incentives (lobbying disclosures, manufacturer indemnity clauses) documented in congressional records.

RISK.rationale: Dose-response estimates from EPA risk assessment; Monte Carlo range cited.

SPEC.rationale: Named facilities, PFOA/PFOS concentrations in ppt, specific counties, enforcement dates.
